title: Large-area all-perovskite-based coplanar photoelectrodes for scaled-up solar hydrogen production
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,3604-3617
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01167H, Paper
Wooyong Jeong, Gyumin Jang, Juwon Yun, Chang-Seop Jeong, Young Sun Park, Hyungsoo Lee, Jaehyun Son, Chan Uk Lee, Jeongyoub Lee, Junwoo Lee, Seongyeon Yang, Soobin Lee, Subin Moon, Jooho Moon
Large-scale solar hydrogen production is enabled by the treatment of perovskite films through additive-added antisolvent bathing, achieving a solar-to-hydrogen efficiency of 9.89% and an outstanding hydrogen production of 145.56 μmol h−1 cm−2.
